brief: Overall bubble risk is moderate based on valuation, speculation, and liquidity signals.

indicators.name: Valuations vs History
indicators.description: Equity valuations remain well above long-term averages.

indicators.name: Speculative Activity
indicators.description: IPO and retail trading activity is stable but watchful.

indicators.name: Liquidity Conditions
indicators.description: Financial conditions have tightened relative to last quarter.
